oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Differential diagnosis of unusual viral diseases
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Castro, Anthony E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cattle diseases
Laboratory diagnosis
Viral diseases
arboviruses
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The purpose of this presentation was to provide an insight into a possible approach in the diagnosis of an unusual viral disease and to alert veterinarians of the virologic facilities available in many diagnostic laboratories. The cooperation engendered between each veterinarian and personnel in a diagnostic laboratory should provide a confirmation of a viral diagnosis and also offer approaches in the prevention and control of unusual viral problems which can affect our domestic cattle.
